casebody.data:
No. 565,

Misc.

McGrady v. Smyth, Superintendent, Virginia Penitentiary. Petitioner pro se. A. S. Harrison, Attorney General of Virginia, and Thomas M. Miller, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of habeas corpus denied. Treating the papers submitted as a petition for writ of certiorari, certiorari is denied.
